skilllist.skilldesc:
Valentina gains 8-50 extra EXP each time she deals damage to an enemy hero. Cooldown: 2s. 
If the enemy hero's level isn't higher than Valentina's, 30% of the damage dealt is converted into her HP. The EXP scales with Valentina's level.

Valentina casts <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Strike</font> in the target direction, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+165% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Enemy heroes hit by <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Strike</font> are marked with a Shadow Sigil for 4s and will be <font color="fb1f1f">terrified</font> for 1s when hit by <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Strike</font> again within the duration (a unit can only be terrified once within 4s).

Valentina dashes in the target direction, firing 3 Shadow Bolts at nearby enemies that deal 125<font color="62f8fe"> (+30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> each. Valentina can cast this skill again within 6s (costs Mana).

The cooldown of <font color="a6aafb">Shadow Strike</font> is reduced by 1s each time a Shadow Bolt hits an enemy.

Valentina slows the target enemy hero by 70% for 0.5s and gains the ability to cast their <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate</font>. Casting the enemy's <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate</font> turns Valentina into the enemy hero's form and allows her to inherit their Basic Attack type for up to 12s. Her skills remain unchanged unless the enemy's <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate</font> has a <font color="a6aafb">Morph</font> effect.
The stolen <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate</font>'s level will be equal to Valentina's <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate</font> level and the Ultimate cooldown will be 120% of the target's Ultimate cooldown (but no lower than 10s). Valentina gains <font color="62f8fe"> (+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fba51f">Physical Attack</font> for the duration if the enemy is a Physical Damage hero. This cannot be used on an enemy Valentina.

data.name: Valentina

__data.skilldesc: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.5 Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.7 Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, [C2knocking back] nearby enemies and dealing <Num1>-<Num2> [C1Magic Damage] (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldescemblem: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Balanced CD Reduction to steal skills, and dish out burst damage.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Equipment can be purchased at <%Num1> of their base price.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Equipment can be purchased at 95% of their base price.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Former head of House Paxley who'd stop at nothing to revive her lover.

assist.desc: Heroes that can buff or CC such as Carmilla and Atlas to give her more opportunities to deal damage.

strong.desc: Heroes that lack mobility or burst such as Hanabi and Faramis are suspectible to Valentina's low cooldown skills that provide soft CC and sustained damage.

weak.desc: Heroes with gap closers or high burst like Hayabusa, Natalia, and Hanzo.
